plot: A very realistic film that tells the story of a family very poor en Espa a. On the death of the wife, the husband is left with two or keep to them; However, the nico that owns is a cow called Cordera. Comes the dilemma of selling the cow or be cast out for not paying the House. Despite the sadness for all that is acent to learn that cow being led to the slaughter, this is sold. The plot unfolds in the framework hist rico an ESPA to uneven, stranded in the war. Love has a color similar to the fate of the cow: the impossibility of obtaining it.
title: Adiós cordera
